properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA TO MARTINIQUE.
DNC 14.
1. S/V MAURABLIA, ONE PERSON ON BOARD, SANK
   BETWEEN SAINT LUCIA (13-53N 060-58W) AND
   MARTINIQUE (14-40N 061-00W) ON 05 APR. ONE
   PERSON MISSING. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
   E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1115/18.
